title: Work done thermal energy of gas during isothermal

content.question: The graph above shows the pressure as a function of volume for a sample of gas that is taken from state X to state Y at constant temperature. Which of the following indicates the sign of the work done on the gas, and whether thermal energy is absorbed or released by the gas during this process?

choices.label: Work done Thermal energy Positive Absorbed
Work done Thermal energy Positive Released
Work done Thermal energy Negative Absorbed
Work done Thermal energy Negative Released

content.answer: Work done Thermal energy Positive Released

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
